document_data.caption: A map showing Goblin Way in northwest Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Goblin Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Goblin Way''' was a street located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Goblin Way was found within northwest Zhentil Keep in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. It connected [[Fortress Street]] in the north with [[Warrior Street]] in the south.
document_data.Description: It was one of Zhentil Keep's smaller streets at roughly {{SI|200|ft|long=yes}} in length.
document_data.Notable Locations: A [[Zhentilar]] barracks was found at the intersection of Goblin Way with Warrior Street.
